Function Documentation

void HT32F_DVB_BuzzerFun ( u16  hFreq,
u8  bDuty,
u32  mode 
)

Init BUZZER.

Parameters:
hFreq,:the PWM frequency of buzzer to be configured. This parameter can be 1 ~ 6000 (Unit: Hz).
bDuty,:the PWM duty of buzzer to be configured. This parameter can be 0 ~ 100 (Unit: %).
mode,:0 for init, 1 for config.
Returns:
None

Definition at line 336 of file ht32f5xxxx_board_01.c.

void HT32F_DVB_BuzzerOutputCmd ( ControlStatus  Control)

Configure BUZZER PWM Frequency and Duty.

Parameters:
Control,:This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
Returns:
None

Definition at line 424 of file ht32f5xxxx_board_01.c.

void HT32F_DVB_COMInit ( COM_TypeDef  COMn,
USART_InitTypeDef *  USART_InitStructure 
)

Configures COM port.

Parameters:
COMn,:Specifies the COM port to be configured. This parameter can be one of following parameters:
  • COM1
  • COM2
USART_InitStructure,:Pointer to a USART_InitTypeDef structure that contains the configuration information for the specified USART peripheral.
Returns:
None

Definition at line 210 of file ht32f5xxxx_board_01.c.

u32 HT32F_DVB_PBGetState ( BUTTON_TypeDef  BUTTON_x)

Returns the selected Button state.

Parameters:
BUTTON_x,:Specifies the Button to be configured. This parameter can be one of following parameters:
  • BUTTON_WAKEUP: Wakeup Push Button
  • BUTTON_KEY1: Key1 Push Button
  • BUTTON_KEY2: Key2 Push Button
Returns:
The Button GPIO pin value.

Definition at line 284 of file ht32f5xxxx_board_01.c.

void HT32F_DVB_PBInit ( BUTTON_TypeDef  BUTTON_x,
BUTTON_MODE_TypeDef  BUTTON_MODE_x 
)

Configures Button GPIO and EXTI.

Parameters:
BUTTON_x,:Specifies the Button to be configured. This parameter can be one of following parameters:
  • BUTTON_WAKEUP: Wakeup Push Button
  • BUTTON_KEY1: Key1 Push Button
  • BUTTON_KEY2: Key2 Push Button
BUTTON_MODE_x,:Specifies Button mode. This parameter can be one of following parameters:
  • BUTTON_MODE_GPIO: Button will be used as simple IO
  • BUTTON_MODE_EXTI: Button will be connected to EXTI channel with interrupt generation capability
Return values:
None

Definition at line 228 of file ht32f5xxxx_board_01.c.
